Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire something of significant value at a price that represents a considerable savings. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for this product. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
